entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: Add a code action that updates all call-sites of a method with changed signature #69197
  • Compiler emits incorrect sequence point in Release builds #69188
  • Missing diagnostics when `selectStatementSyntax.Expression` has an error diagnostic #69184
  • Add an option to disable Preview Changes dialog for FixAll command #69180

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33924.326 #69196
  • Building with a dotnet not on the PATH is broken #69150
  • SyntaxGenerator ignores "scoped" keyword #68959
  • "Implement through" isn't available for primary constructor parameters #69177
    Backlog
  • Surface a warning at the declaration site for language incompatible `[InlineArray]` types #68867
    C# 12.0
  • EnC: Validate type layout constraints for types with primary constructors #68738
  • Implement EnC support for Primary Constructors #67108
    17.8 P1

PullRequests

Created

  • Update PublishData.json for 17.8 P1 snap #69198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Concord dependency versions and fix nullability warnings #69195
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Enable tests for #68731 #69193
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • F1 help for `#if` and `#else` refers to preprocessor symbols, not `if_CSharpKeyword` and `else_CSharpkeyword` #69192
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use variable group for apiscan #69191
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use consistent failure mode for inline arrays that have unsupported element fields due to different reasons. #69190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Results of using 'use collection expressions' #69189
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add more `ref readonly` tests and address comments #69183
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Merge `main` into `features/RefReadonly` #69181
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Reduce `HashSet<TypeWithAnnotations>` allocations in MethodTypeInferrer.Fix #69070
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.8 P1

Updated

  • Initial support for a set of analyzers/fixers to update existing code to use collection expressions. #69118
    Area-Analyzers, Story, untriaged
  • Implement extension indexer access #69122
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Look scope by scope for method group natural type #69158
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.8
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Remove unnecessary calls to `Contains` for sets #69179
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Honor Concord's TruncatedString flag to reduce memory usage #68969
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged
  • Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 7.2.1.6856 (#67875) #69065
  • Update cancellation token handling behavior for certain analyzer APIs #69108
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Another way to correct generate Uri for new Document when resolve code action #68995
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add filePath when generates new Document in MoveTypeEditor #68900
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Force public APIs to return complete results #68804
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Localize C# Interactive window title #69066
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove mocks of setting services for unit tests #69160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Clarify that setting to use .NET SDK preview only exists in non-preview Visual Studio #64514
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Cache SubstitutedNamedTypeSymbol.GetMembers to avoid unnecessary allocations #69164
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce `TypeConversions` allocations by caching them in AssemblySymbol #69040
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix Color Color const field initialization accessing the Color type #68283
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols in C# #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Relax method conversions with ref readonly parameters #69020
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
